website_summaries.verdict: One of the least expensive smartphone microphones you'll find that still offers good quality sound.
pros: Uses a 3.5 millimeter jack to work with Apple, Android, and Windows devices
Includes a case, wind muff, and 59-inch cable
Works with the lightning to 3.5 millimeter adapter
cons: Some microphones arrive not in working order, and better sound quality can be found with other slightly more expensive microphones

customer_reviews.title: Great sound that doesn't cost a lot
customer_reviews.text: I recently just received the ultimate cavalier microphone for my iPhone and iPad. The sound quality is pretty amazing, very loud and clear. I create youtube videos and I bought this to record my voice and others. The little pouch which came with my order is perfect. I completely satisfied and would recommend this for any iphone users.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Clark

customer_reviews.title: I am super impressed at how well this microphone works
customer_reviews.text: I am super impressed at how well this microphone works. My phone recognized it immediately and it worked perfectly with my video recorder and also with my audio recording app. The sound is crystal clear and handles the highs and lows without peaking. I used the microphone to record my video review and you can hear how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: Bob L.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed! Bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: This little inexpensive mic does exactly what I need it to do: Record better quality sound than my iPhone 6S Plus. My primary uses are recording guitar, singing and vlog/ instagram story type videos. It works great. Good buy! It will definitely give you more volume and clarity than your phones built in mic. It actually gives you more bass too with the foam wind thingamajig. In the video I placed the lavalier on my shirt between my mouth and guitar. I could have moved it closer to my mouth to make the make vocals louder but my voice aint that great. :)
customer_reviews.author: W.R.V.

customer_reviews.title: Best Product And Value Mic For 2017
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was an incredible input audio mic for the price. In fact, I do a lot of media and it's the best for its price out there for 2017!
customer_reviews.author: GMH Entertainment

customer_reviews.title: This microphone is amazing! I did a quick test in the car
customer_reviews.text: This microphone is amazing! I did a quick test in the car, with the radio on. The cord was long enough to attach the mic to my husband, while I sat witb my phone in the passengers seat! It was definitely easy to hear him talk when we recorded a video. I took the mic off and recorded a video and you could hardly hear my husband talk! Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Taysha Walter

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I only write reviews for products I really believe in. I ordered this just three days before I needed it and got it in two days with the prime free shipping. I needed it for an interview project and it worked absolutely perfectly. I interviewed people at a giant festival with music and crowds and I could hear them clearly. The sound was crisp and clear and it worked flawlessly with my iPhone. I just had to plug it into my headphone jack on the attachment for the newer iPhone and record. It worked very well and I'm so glad that I got it for just $10.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Had to add a TRRS stereo ext cable-works great on iphone 6
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work as a plug and play-until i added the part listed below-only 5.99. A TRRS stereo ext cable. It gets plugged into phone then the mic into that. Works perfectly and I get an extra three feet. Conwork 3.5mm Male to Female Audio Extension Cable, Auxiliary 4-Conductor TRRS Stereo [Gold Plated Connectors] for Apple, Samsung, Motorola, HTC, Nokia, LG, Sony, 3ft by Conwork
customer_reviews.author: A.M. Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Low Cost Mic - Flawless Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this for creating Youtube videos. My car is pretty loud and drowns out my voice but putting this on my seat belt gives my voice clarity. The sound is flawless, which I find to be great for a low cost lapel mic! If you're using this on a Galaxy Note 5 like me, you'll need to pick up a TRRS to TRS adapter (also low cost) for good sound quality. Overall, highly recommended. You can't beat the price. If you want to see it in action, look for 'Rated R Cars' on Youtube.
customer_reviews.author: Rated R Cars

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: I am a YouTuber and I wanted better sound quality. I purchased 2 of these thinking it could work for my Android phone... Little did I know it wouldn't. When I played back my video I did not hear any difference than my regular background sound. So I returned them
customer_reviews.author: Mizz_Thrifty!

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this microphone to try and use on my Xbox but it didn't work right out of the package. Not only did it not work (tested on my Xbox, my phone, and my PC), the two other facets of the microphone sucked! The clip and the cord. The cord is obnoxiously long and clip is extremely stiff and very hard to open with two fingers. I actually thought the clip was broke at first because I couldn't get it opened and had to use both hands to hold it steady and be able to apply enough pressure. I'd spend the extra few $$ and get an established brand if you don't feel like gambling.
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs Spud

customer_reviews.title: With this I can keep my phone in my pocket and the sound is great. It takes out all background noise and leaves ...
customer_reviews.text: I often use my cell phone to record spoken notes, but for it to work well I have to put the phone up to my face. With this I can keep my phone in my pocket and the sound is great. It takes out all background noise and leaves a clear sound.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: User friendly, works great, good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I am new to videography and recording sound, but I am charged with making some internal instructional videos for my company. I have been a professional still photographer for over 10 years, but sound is definitely a new beast to handle. I made a recording before where the audio quality was rather poor due to my Sony A7RII was picking up the air con noise. I ended up giving this a try to record the sound on the iPhone and the sound quality was exceptionally better. I just had to re-layer the sound back into the video while doing the cuts using Movie Maker. Turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Yu

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these to use with 7 and 8 year olds recording class responses. One of the mics worked for a total of three recordings, but it was not a hassle to return to Amazon. The sound quality connected to a tablet is pretty good. The one mic left in my class had the clip fall off from use. The little screw that holds it on came undone. I think I can fix it, but haven't had the screwdriver with me at work to do so yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Belding

customer_reviews.title: Made a World of Difference
customer_reviews.text: Bought to help the audio quality of demonstration videos being shot with my iPhone. Audio was improved dramatically. Voice was warmer, closer (but not too close, no clipping), and the room acoustics were virtually eliminated. Performed a quick mic test (one video using iPhone built-in mic and same shot with this) and it was night & day. Can't believe you can get this kind of quality for the price (along with Prime Shipping). Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: TPBayAMZN

customer_reviews.title: Use for video calls and teleconferencing
customer_reviews.text: I use this strictly for video conferencing. I do a lot of video and tele calls for work and this makes that easier and cuts out those, "You were breaking up or fading out" moments. I think everyone should have one of these as those calls can be pretty painful with speakerphones. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: LindsvanleerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great little microphone.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little microphone. I was pleased with the clarity of sound of the recordings I have made. It comes with a nice bag. I recommend it. I have made voice recordings and recordings with my Irish whistle.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia lady

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My son has used this all weekend to change his voice to typing in a Google Doc paper. He has sensory issues so the standard head set is not a good fit for us. This worked great!! I have also used it to record several screencasts for students with great success. It comes with a littl pouch that makes it easy for me to throw it in my purse when I think I might need it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan M.

customer_reviews.title: Gotta luv this lav
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little lav mic for my purposes -- mainly for backup notes during interviews. It's not broadcast quality, but it picks up sound really well and was a steal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly clear audio in a tiny gadget!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is amazing! I don't use it often but sometimes I do online tutoring and prefer to not repeat myself over and over and this makes it so much clearer for the kids and parents to understand me. I can hook it to my tank top strap and it's hidden or I can clip it right to the top of my collar. I only wish the cord was longer but otherwise I am very happy with this little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: I am just keeping it because the mic is good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Still giving 5 stars because nothing wrong with the product. However, it did not accomplish the goal that I purchased it for. My phone's microphone stopped working so I thought I could talk with this microphone inserted, but what I did not realize is that even the audio is routed towards the microphone because phone thinks a headphone is inserted. I am just keeping it because the mic is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: upoudel

customer_reviews.title: I bought two of these and didn't use them until ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and didn't use them until recently and neither one worked. There isnt snu buttons from what I can see so I assume you plug and play, but it didn't work at all and it's to late to return them.
customer_reviews.author: PD the CEO

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little mic! Was very clear when I went back to listen to my audio. For the price, it's amazing it works so well! Long enough to plug to your phone and clip You to record yourself and its very discreet and can clip on anywhere ! It didn't fall off and I've used it 3 x so far.. one of those times being to record my audition tape! Very pleased !
customer_reviews.author: Coco H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little thing!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I didn't know what to expect from this mic considering it was pretty cheap, but it's literally amazing. I posted episode one of my podcast recently and the HD effect of the quality was amazing. There were no pops, it was easy to use, and it's outstanding considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for PlayStation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mic for my nephew as a gift. He has only had it for a few days but already called to say thank you twice. He uses with his PlayStation and has nohing but good things to say. He says the sound is great and his friends can hear him like they are right it the same room.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great little mic
customer_reviews.text: This microphone is awesome for the price. If you make videos using your phone or computer, this thing makes a huge difference. Super easy to use, just plug in and go. I make informal videos sometimes for my job and it has increased the sound quality drastically. It won't deliver professional quality, but for the price it's an awesome buy.
customer_reviews.author: Erica B

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this lavalier microphone. I have a large library of videos on YouTube that were recorded at home and on the road, to include overseas, and the sound quality drastically improved once I started using the lavalier microphone. I was recently doing a voiceover and I looked down and saw that my microphone was unplugged so I stopped recording, plugged in the microphone, and then started over because I know the microphone makes a tremendous difference. By the way, I have had this lavalier microphone for a while and there has been no wear and tear on the product and therefore no decreased performance.
customer_reviews.author: KOLLIN L. TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Defective MiracleSound Lavalier Microphone
customer_reviews.text: I just received the product a few minutes ago and I was super excited to test it. So disappointed, that the mic is not working. Tested both in Dell laptop and phones (Samsung and Huawei) and it never worked. Got a defective unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Redito

customer_reviews.title: Average mic for average user
customer_reviews.text: This microphone is "ok." It's a step up from using your phone's built in mic but I feel like the cord is too thin and potentially fragile... so recording with my phone in my pocket may lead to a shorter life span. Also, although it seems to drown out soft static noises and breathing sounds from the user, it does indeed catch a lot of chatter in the background pretty clearly. Perhaps I should go with a more expensive directional mic to eliminate that? Not bad little mic though. Should come with a small hard case to protect it.
customer_reviews.author: adamBOMB

customer_reviews.title: This little mic is so powerful
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I went forward with ordering this lapel mic from you all. There are soooo many options out there but I believe this one caught my eye with the well thought out description and the previous customers videos testing it out sold me. I just received today, very quick shipment not sure if it is because I have amazon Prime but I am so satisfied. ;) I tested this with my Iphone adapter for my Iphone X, works like a charm. thank you
customer_reviews.author: LaTeshia

customer_reviews.title: I like this little mic so much
customer_reviews.text: I like this little mic so much! Now my voice is nice and clear I can record lots of video with a very good sound and the quality of my daily vlogs has improved a lot! It comes with is own little bag and a little clip to attach the mic to your t-shirt (or wherever you need to) .. Thumbs up for this one!
customer_reviews.author: Deni

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These microphones are great! I bought them for use in a film class I teach - the students were very skeptical about needing a microphone when filming with their iPads but once they used them they were totally convinced. Now I have students coming in all the time to borrow them for film making in other classes since they lend a real professionalism to their films. They pick up sound from pretty far away and cut out a lot of background noise. They are super easy to use (just plug it in) and come in a quality leather pouch for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance and glad I did
customer_reviews.text: If you are using the mic on your camera or cell phone, stop now and get this Lav Mic. The Miracle Sound will give your video what it is missing, your voice; clear and audible. I moved back about 6 feet and the audio was ideal during playback. I was planning on getting a small shotgun mic, but there may not be a need to. Some $$ savings there. Ideal for self taping, audition tapes and zoom calls. When using with a cell phone, you will have to unplug the mic in order to hear the audio! I'd you don't, you may think theic doesn't work. Ask me how I know!
customer_reviews.author: EXRC

customer_reviews.title: You get more than what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Other people say the sound is a bit hollow. One of the issues I have with it, is a weak connection between cord and mic, just some staple thing. You can freely spin the cord and the wires leading to the mic start to twist, not good. Then, after getting mac and cheese on the sponge filter, cleaning it revealed the material falls appart easily (small pinches pull pieces off). Finally, the metal clip provided is a bit more difficult to open than it should be. The low cost makes it worth it though, just don't expect it to stay together if you yank it from it's pouch by the mic part.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I would write zero stars on this if I could oh, I was extremely excited for this mic to come in the mail as I am a product reviewer , and I felt like this would help the quality of my videos. This product does not work at all. It picks up no sound at all. I am completely disappointed in this product and would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah walczak

customer_reviews.title: @forwardassistmechanics
customer_reviews.text: It does microphone things and sounds better that the cruddy microphone in my phone, appears to be the same exact design as some higher priced units, decent quality for the price and metal clips instead of low quality plastic knockoff. Sounds way way better than I expected........ Fix stuff....
customer_reviews.author: Opinionated consumer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, once you figure out what you’re doing wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Works better than expected for the price! I thought at first it didn’t work but I have an iPhone. Had to use the iPhone attachment to plug into the iPhone headphone/charging spot. And then... now this is KEY.... when playing back after recording in order to hear anything YOU HAVE TO TAKE THE PLUG OUT OF THE IPHONE AND HIT THE VOLUME BUTTON ON THE SIDE OF THE IPHONE. I don’t know know why but if you don’t do both of those things you won’t hear sound when you play back your video.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: BUY SOMETHING ELSE
customer_reviews.text: Ok so First off.. the AUDIO QUALITY IS GARBAGE out creates the aweful popping noise and the audio it self it terrible. On top of that since you plug it into the headphone Jack the speakers on your phone don't work anymore so now you have to un plug it to hear the playback.. not a great design
customer_reviews.author: Jordan G.

customer_reviews.title: DOA garbage with very short TRRS cord; may not be compatible with any standard TRRS ports.
customer_reviews.text: Tested this model of mic with four different sound input devices. It failed with all five. The mic did not work with Apple iPad accessories, did not work with MacBook Pro accessories, did not work with Android phone TRRS port, and did not work with Windows audio input either on the laptop or on the docking station. If the mic TRRS design places the mic input signal on the wrong part of the TRRS connection, then it will never work with the standard gear that the vendor claims is compatible.
customer_reviews.author: MarkOfWA

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars
customer_reviews.text: When you plug this microphone into your iPad it disables the iPad’s speakers, rendering the microphone completely useless. Now you maintain that this problem is the fault of the iPad; it ought to have been designed to allow for an external mike. Well, it is A fault of the iPad—so zero stars for the iPad too—but it is also a fault of this mike (and a much more serious fault) considering that this is supposed to be used on an iPad. It ought to have taken the oPad’s faulty design into account.
customer_reviews.author: theta

customer_reviews.title: Decent microphone!
customer_reviews.text: Knowing how to use these mics is crucial. Improper use will lead to a very bad experience, I've learned. The quality is great for the microphone itself and price. Not the best noise cancellation, but it'll probably achieve the (presumably minor) things you need granted you know how to use it. The wire itself is terribly sensitive, and causes a lot of unwanted feedback. If you tape it to your chest and pray that the wire doesn't create annoying feedback, the quality is great for capturing your voice. Otherwise, buy a shotgun microphone, or boom mic. If you're recording something and need the microphone on your body, just beware of the wire movement.
customer_reviews.author: A Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Oh how I love this thing! This microphone is a replacement for another lavalier mic which only recorded in mono and required 3 unusual button-cell-type batteries. This new one just plugs directly into my phone and voila! It records in stereo and doesn't require an in-line power source. The only drawback it the cord length, at 3 feet long, it's definitely lacking. However, this is still a five star product despite the cord's length.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for fun to see if it worked and if so maybe use it for some ghost story telling podcast but it works well. It may pick up background noise depending on what it is and how close you are. The cord length is perfect. However when replaying audio you have to unplug the microphone or else you won't hear it because it tries to go thru the microphone. So having to unplug and plug it back in is lame. I hope that over time doesn't mess up the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Black Lilithx

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Easy to use! Travel friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a different mic for a second YouTube Channel I started. My other one had to be on a stand and just wasn't long enough to be used so I had to buy this type of mic since I would be walking or moving around a lot. I plug it into my Android and it works perfectly! The quality is actually better than my other much more expensive mic! For the price and quality I highly recommend it! So easy to use, small and travel friendly. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTY NICOLE

customer_reviews.title: Really good sound quality for a really good price
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm really liking this. Will you get studio quality recordings? Nope. Will it be better than what you get with your phone microphone? Oh, yes. Perfect for interviews. Very good at cutting down wind and plosives ("p" and "b" sounds). And for this price, you can buy a handful.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Makes a huge difference in sound quality when making videos. The cord is long enough to comfortably use without being limiting or in the way. It is exactly what I was looking for !
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Microphone
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a inexpensive option for a iPhone microphone and saw this lab mic. At the price point I didn't have too high expectations. Well it just arrived and I tried it out and it was perfect. The sound quality for recording yourself on your phone is really good. I'm not sure the fidelity would hold up recording things other than voice, but for recording your voice it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Chan

customer_reviews.title: Works fine with my Google Pixel 2 phone when I use the USB-C headphone dongle
customer_reviews.text: Works fine with my Google Pixel 2 phone when I use the USB-C headphone dongle that came with the phone. Sound quality is no better than the phone's built-in microphone, but being able to position the microphone separately from the phone is main reason I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: l2Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: great sound fits my iphone 6 connects iphone to wifi speaker via app
customer_reviews.text: This is a great find. I hope it lasts. I just tested and the sound quality is great for what I need. beside it obvious use as lapel microphone with great sound, This is the perfect solution for me as teacher with a soft voice. I have been able to to turn my phone into a live loud speaker, I connected my phone to my external wifi speaker. via a free microphone app, the sound is great and everyone can hear me. I think i will get a second pair as back up.
customer_reviews.author: goly

customer_reviews.title: Missing pictured accessories!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered microphone and I guess it is true what they say - "you get what you pay for." Horrible quality and build. I am not sure how they were even able to find such flimsy material. And you better be prepared to hold your phone in your hand the whole time as the cable is very short. When I placed my order the microphone was pictured with an extension cable. However, mine arrived without the cable. I contacted the seller and all they did was to switch the picture to no longer show the cable. LOL. Spend a couple of bucks more and get a quality item and avoid theses guys!
customer_reviews.author: SuperSmartestBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Will not work with Mono female connector
customer_reviews.text: I need to plug the mic into an electronic piano and missed that the microphone has a stereo jack. While mechanically compatible, it won't work without an adapter. Be aware of this if you have a similar application. No complaints about the seller or the product! The description and pictures show the stereo jack clearly. But I suggest adding a warning for cases like mine.
customer_reviews.author: P. Berenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: This lapel is wonderful, the cord length is perfect for my simple desk sitdown videos, and changing to this for any voiceovers has drastically improved the overall quality and performance of my YouTube videos. I'll continue using this, and update here as needed. Second use update. In the background we could here a rubbing noise, unsure if it was from hair or clothing because the video shows nothing moving near the mic. Will troubleshoot and update.
customer_reviews.author: Tilly

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: There is really nothing to dislike about this Lavalier mic. It instantly improved the sound quality of my spoken word, using my tablet. I tutor a number of online foreign language students and the audio quality of my pronunciation is therefore very important. Every single one of my students said that the clarity of my voice had increased in a big way. As long as you don't expect professional sound quality, this Lavalier mic does a great job, for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Yeska

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty good for LG. I compare it with and workout, and with the microphone definitely is better. It's more loud although it still pick up the background noise, we have a humidifier and you can still hear it in the background. But I didn't expect a perfect outcome for $10 microphone. *WILL UPDATE IF SOMETHING WENT WRONG*
customer_reviews.author: Jhen

customer_reviews.title: Not Useful
customer_reviews.text: Not really helpful at all. Bought them to have less background noise for my vlogs/tip videos through a Galaxy s10, but it made the humming in the background louder. My voice also did not seem clearer than when I did not have them. To sum: having the mic was like amplifying everything (while heightening the background hum) at the same time while not using the mic made everything sound quieter and my voice was clearer than the background hum. It was cheap and hooked up easy, so I guess you could say it was like buying something you think is useful at the dollar store, but breaks as soon as you use it. Would not recommend, I returned instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Sybil

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic 🎤
customer_reviews.text: I really like this microphone. It's clear and I can clip it on my shirt for a great carrying manner. Fits my phone perfectly. At first I was confused because I thought I needed to do something on my phone before I used it but turns out I do not need to do anything but open my voice recorder app. It's so easy and fun to use. It's the perfect size also! I recommend this for anyone who likes to do a lot of voice recordings/pod casts etc.. because it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Love

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!! product and excellent support
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered to record the very faint voice of a quadriplegic patient for a testimonial. As it turned out, I needed an additional device and called the seller who gave me excellent support- he recommended I use a "y" connection and promptly then sent it me at no extra cost! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Donspl8

customer_reviews.title: Lousy sound
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought this thinking the sound quality would be better than my cell phone. I was wrong. This thing sounds muffled and tinny, and makes it hard to understand anything being said. I'm just gonna record on my phone until I can afford a high quality microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Goldfish

customer_reviews.title: Great mic
customer_reviews.text: The audio is great, no problems with the quality of the hardware. I wish the cord was a bit longer is my only critique.
customer_reviews.author: Sensor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and quality.  Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Tested this Mike on front chest, 6 to 7 inches from my mouth. Tested on Panasonic voicetracer recorder and a cellphone recorder app. Sound pick up was excellent. Good fidelity. No noise pickup from overhead fact or wall A/C. Long cord length. Highly recommended. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D

customer_reviews.title: I guess it works
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is okay, definitely don’t use for motovlogging. It picks up wind super easy, and the foam piece that comes with it is much too small. This would be great for inside recording only if you want a discreet mic. I’ll be using this in my YouTube videos soon @Lonewolf Lucas
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Rough Quality
customer_reviews.text: Though the mic is sensitive it's not always for the best. The quality of recordings varies and it would not work while filming at all. It would record voice recordings, however when it gets sensitive it does not have enough quality to stop it from clipping and making it sound like a jumbled mess. If you could adjust the sensitivity that would fix half the problems.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Failed to do the job that was promise to do.
customer_reviews.text: The cord is long enough to use it, but this microphone doesn't improve the sound quality. I did use it in my tablet and and it work, then in my Samsung phone with the usb type c adapter and it didn't work, my phone was picking up its own microphone. I will keep it just because it was cheap, but honestly I was mislead by the videos showing that it was a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Author Unpublished - Product Review
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this little microphone isn't great. It's sturdy, it works, it clips on as it should... but the sound quality is terrible - there is so much static and extra background noise that it's really not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Author Unpublished

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I have just finished my video recording the sound is very clear such a great deal to buy this in such a price quality of the sound clear once you place the mic on your shirt that’s the best position for it to give clear sound record specially on live streams or recording a nice quality video. Mic come sealed in a pack easy to use. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: ahlam

customer_reviews.title: So glad I got this!
customer_reviews.text: Ok you can't beat this!! New tti blogging and wanted something affordable since I'll be using my phone for now. I was scared to purchase even with the hood reviews but I went for it. So glad I did!! The sound quality is great with my Samsung S10+and super easy to use!! Don't hesitate and just get it :)
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great for just about anything mobile
customer_reviews.text: I'm always on the run doing podcasts, interviews and even live streaming videos outside. The sound quality is great and I love the windbreaker and the effectiveness of it. This is simple to plug in and clip on and you're rolling in seconds. I believe it was a good purchase for me and I purchased it not even researching how good it was. It was inexpensive and I really had nothing to lose. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Prescott

customer_reviews.title: Helps me to sound so much better on my videos
customer_reviews.text: Just had to plug into my phone and it worked great! Shipping was fast, I can use this for my virtual teaching this year.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kate Davis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I really didn’t think it would make a difference recording video with out this little mic, but i was sooo wrong. I’m starting my YouTube channel to document my weight loss, so I bought this is was only $5 or $6 to have better quality sound since i record with my iPhone. Sound is much more crisp and clear and besides when i was rustling papers in my hand by the mic, it completely drowned out my air condition and noise from the road that sounds like the cars are inside my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Works good, I am using Samsung note S9
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised after opening package. Better packaging and quality then expected for the $. Nice sturdy clip, long enough cord. Works with phone as desired. Almost seems to good to be true.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound on this mic. I noticed that if you have it pinned to your shirt if there’s any movement it’ll show up. That’s the only downside. But honestly I can work with it and ultimately I think it’s an excellent mic for the price! I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: I keep my laptop hooked up to a monitor and usually leave the laptop lid closed. With the lid closed the internal mic is unusable. I needed something that I could use for web meetings. This works perfectly. I just plugged it in and it works.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good Mic great Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of I rig microphones for a podcast paid over 80 for them and one broke so we bought one of these and honestly can’t tell the difference we actually prefer to use this type of mic over the I rig one. It has good sound quality and we can’t get enough just ordered another one to use for the podcast Banana Hammock.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and the packaging was great. The only thing I did not like about it was the chord on it was not long enough. I have to hold my phone in my hand to record with this mic because it does not leave room to reach past 2 arm lengths.
customer_reviews.author: Resa Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work for the voice recorder I bought it for. I got it to take audio notes on my digital recorder. I thought with a corded microphone I just didn't want to have to hold i, but I guess i will have to continue to to so.
customer_reviews.author: j022774

customer_reviews.title: Great mic
customer_reviews.text: I had another lavalier mic so my expectations were low, but I am really surprised by this one. The audio quality is great and the cord length is perfect. I connect it to my phone using an adapter since my phone doesn't have an audio jack and it records perfectly. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: COlivetree

customer_reviews.title: For the price, good sound
customer_reviews.text: Not the BEST sound, but considering the price, I'd definitely recommend it. If you're just starting out and want something better than just your phone or laptop mic, this is an improvement. Super quick and easy to use. I love it but I did end up getting better quality mics after a few months. Still a good starter lavalier.
customer_reviews.author: wonderfulday

customer_reviews.title: A must buy when it goes on sale!
customer_reviews.text: I got mine for around $10.99 when it was on sale. It is a fairly standard microphone and does its job well. After a couple of test runs on my phone, I would say that the audio quality is an 8 out of 10. If you are trying to get some really good quality audio, I would consider buying a more expensive model.
customer_reviews.author: Secret Stash Bros Builds

customer_reviews.title: wonderful seller, great product.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to record vlogs and needed a small microphone for android. The first one came without the wind screen muffler piece. I contacted amazon, and the seller, and the next day the whole equipment was at my door. Excellent, excellent is all I can say. The quality is great. You will need a voice recorder app, but it is free, and quality is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: The price is great, but the mic sound is rather rough
customer_reviews.text: The price is great, but the mic sound is rather rough...and it picks up everything that emits a noise in the room although not clearly just garbled noise. I got this to do mobile recording for a show but not sure it will work at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Dissette

customer_reviews.title: worked for about a week
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this microphone when it first arrived. I wasn't able to use it for a project, though. It stopped working after a week. I tried to use it on three different devices and the same result with all--no sound. This is the third audio device I have returned to Amazon in the past couple weeks, either because the description was inaccurate or a device was defective.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap way to upgrade your audio a bit
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use, plug and play. It's a 3mm headphone jack... I mean dont buy it if you dont have an adapter or a device that can use that kind of plug. Seems pretty simple to me! I'll update if it stops working or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: Asia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Appears quality construction. Disappointing because the picture clearly shows an extension cable. Did not come in package. However, that would not stop me from buying again. Great mic for cheap.
customer_reviews.author: jerry  smay

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my kids to make their videos and they work really well...better than expected actually. They are very small so easy to misplace if you are not careful as we have already lost one to the black hole in our house.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to use an iPad to record the school news show. Arrived on time, extremely reasonable price, works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mic
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son for his YouTube videos. The sound quality is exceptional. He was upstairs recording and we have a aquarium downstairs, you can hear the water from the aquarium. The sound is crystal clear. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MS.LD

customer_reviews.title: Just simply plug into the earphone jack of your smartphone & you will have a much better quality audio
customer_reviews.text: This made Vlogging much easier. Just simply plug into the earphone jack of your smartphone & you will have a much better quality audio. It had no problem picking up background sounds such as running water & other activies while filming a YouTube video. The sound was at least 30 to 40% better over the stock microphone in my smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce E. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This product was a waste of my money it didn't work from the get go. I don't know if I received a defective one but nothing happened and the instructions were a was if my time. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: High quality at a really good price
customer_reviews.text: I'm definitely happy with it. I watched the review videos. I'll be using it for vlogging stuff so you can just follow me of social (@ijaidathompson) and watch any recent videos and get an idea of the quality. It has a nice long cord about 4 feet. I bet I could get an extension if I needed longer. And it comes with a little pouch which is convenient. I tested it with a friend and their remark was that it sounded like I was "RIGHT there". Good clarity and doesn't pick up very much background noise. Overall great for the price and makes a very noticable difference in the audio quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jaida Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Back it goes
customer_reviews.text: Very poor product. Not nearly as good as the built-in mic on my phone. Also it is intermittent, does not record consistently. I didn't expect studio sound but I can't even record voice memos properly. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ed B

customer_reviews.title: Great lav mike!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice microphone. It has great sound quality connected to my old smartphone, and I'm very happy with it. It even comes in a protective carrying care, which I REALLY like. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUT FRAGILE
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until I bumped into the counter while plugged in to the phone and BENT IT (not broke,.. bent). No longer worky , worky!! HAS to be made with the lightest weight metal known to man.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: It's good. Works great
customer_reviews.text: It's good. Works great. Like others have said, it's a bit loud. I'm a loud person anyway, I wanted a mic for clearer sound, not because I need to be heard. So I'm going to have to work on my volume so it doesn't overwhelm the mic. Other than that, I find it delightful.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nox

customer_reviews.title: Defective clamp
customer_reviews.text: The clamp is broken. Does not work. I can’t get it to open. I was away and returned the day after the return. I’d like to exchange for one that works. I can’t get a return processed. Disheartening.
customer_reviews.author: Saff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this little thing for the price ! I have a small youtube channel and didn’t want to spend a ton on a mic but needed one. Literally the sound quality is so good there is no need to pay a ton! Would definitely recommend. Check out my youtube channel : Olivia Danae
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: This Lavalier Microphone is a great mic for me.
customer_reviews.text: The Lavalier Microphone is a good quality mic for me. It has great sound for my videos so far with no background noise. Using this microphone my voice is very clear and understandable in my videos. The only thing I would say is I wish it came with an adaptor to plug into my computer so my voice would come across as clear as it does on my phone videos, but I will just have to find an adaptor for that. Connecting it to my phone is perfect, it is not a loose fit and stays plugged in and I would recommend the Ultimate Lavalier Microphone for an android phone because it works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Swetman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing microphone for such a cheap price!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about buying it (which I randomly did on a whim), and I am thoroughly impressed. The sound quality is amazing, but beware on how loud it will be if you have the phone too close to your mouth 😂. It filters all the unwanted noise, and is perfect for blogging and asmr videos. I was really surprised at how awesome this microphone was for the price. Would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cambrie

customer_reviews.title: Great little microphone with features!
customer_reviews.text: Has good sound quality, a simple plug in & go design, a fairly long cord, and good range (you don't have to bend down for the mic to pick up). The fact that it has a nice little travel pouch, and a sturdy, metal lapel clip is just icing on the cake! Fantastic value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm_of_salt_and_light

customer_reviews.title: Amazing microphone
customer_reviews.text: I love this microphone! It is small and works perfectly. The sound of my video improved drastically, the quality of it is way higher than its price! It clips very well to the shirt, there is no way for it to fall. It does not feel cheap and the cable in long enough to record with a tripod in front of me. I am so happy with this purchase and already got nice comments on my video about the sound quality!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: really well construction. But All right, it is not the best I ever used, but it is honest for the price. Keep in mind that you will need to place the mic far from the mouth, almost at the belly button or you will have pick of audios, and will sound really bed. If you place correctly, It will turn out great.
customer_reviews.author: Flederico Silveira

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work :(
customer_reviews.text: I plug it in, hold it about four inches from my mouth, speak into it and when I watch the video back it has no sound
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

product_meta.title: Ultimate Lavalier Microphone for Bloggers and Vloggers Lapel Mic Clip-on Omnidirectional Condenser for iPhone Ipad Samsung Android Windows Smartphones
product_meta.description:
Amazing Smartphone and Tablet Miracle Sound Microphone
Are you looking for a microphone that actually captures the sound around you perfectly when you make spontaneous videos with your smartphone or tablet? Tired of having horrible audio quality on your best video recordings?
If so, Miracle Sound Microphone is the solution for you!
Compatible with Most Smartphones and Tablets
The Miracle Sound Microphone has a 3.5mm TRRS Jack that is compatible with: Apple iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android & Windows Smartphones and many more tablet and smartphone devices. Just plug in and enjoy better sound in your new videos.

Perfect Omnidirectional Recordings
This small, handy microphone picks up sound from all directions, ensuring that every detail of the moment is recorded.
Great Bonus Materials!
Your Miracle Sound Microphone comes with: a special deluxe case, a high quality wind muff, strong lapel clip.
Satisfaction Guaranteed
If you are not happy with this purchase, we offer you a complete refund, no questions asked.
Take advantage of our fantastic offer now, before stocks run out!
feature_bullets: QUALITY SOUND RECORDINGS! With the Miracle Sound Microphone you can finally create the perfect videos and audio files on your smartphone and tablet. Pristine sound without effort, no matter where you are!

OMNIDIRECTIONAL! Pick up sounds from your environment easily. Ideal for recording videos with your family, for your work, as well as recording important moments in your life with excellent sound precision.

MULTIPLE COMPATIBILITY! The 3.5mm TRRS Jack of this tiny microphone is compatible to be used with Apple iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android & Windows Smartphones and many more tablet and smartphone devices.
AMAZING BONUS MATERIAL! Our Miracle Sound Microphone comes with a deluxe case to keep it safe, a special wind muff, a durable lapel clip and the longest cord in the market at 59” (1.5m).
100% MONEY BACK SATISFACTION GUARANTEE! You either love the recordings our Miracle Sound Microphone makes or we give you your money back. Take advantage of our special offer now!
